item.title: All revenants [BOTH]
item.dc:creator: @dutchboy dutchboy
item.description:
@dutchboy wrote:

This is what your adding

I AM OWNER BLADE ON R LOCUS AND R SERVER

You must have the 525 anims and the 474-525 models packed or just in ur client for this to work. Also the ids of the npcs work in my client but you might have to decrease them to work for your client.

[COLOR=“Red”]Non renamed[/COLOR]
first add this method in class5:
(yes i no it ugly and can be done better:|)

	public void configs(String name, int stand, int walk, int level, byte space, int modelAmount, int[] modelsIds, String examine) {
    		aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; 
    		method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60);
		aStringArray66 = new String[5];
    		aStringArray66[1] = "Attack";
		if(modelAmount == 1) {
			anIntArray94 = new int[1];

Then add these configs:

	if(i == 6998) { // NPC ID
		class5.configs("Revenant dragon", 8589, 8590, 135, (byte)2, 1, new int[] {31721}, "A ghost of a dragon slain during the God wars.");

	}

[COLOR=“red”]RENAMED[/COLOR]
Add this method in EntityDef

	public void configs(String name, int stand, int walk, int level, byte space, int modelAmount, int[] modelsIds, String examine) {
    		stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[630];
    		readValues(stream);
		actions = new String[5];
    		actions[1] = "Attack";
		if(modelAmount == 1) {
			modelArray = new int[1];
    			modelArray[0] = modelsIds[0];
		}
		if(modelAmount == 2) {
			modelArray = new int[2];
    			modelArray[0] = modelsIds[0];
    			modelArray[1] = modelsIds[1];
		}
		if(modelAmount == 3) {
			modelArray = new int[3];
    			modelArray[0] = modelsIds[0];
    			modelArray[1] = modelsIds[1];
    			modelArray[2] = modelsIds[2];
		}
		if(modelAmount == 4) {

		}
		if(modelAmount == 5) {

		}
		if(modelAmount == 6) {

    			modelArray[2] = modelsIds[2];

			modelArray[5] = modelsIds[5];
		}
		if(modelAmount == 7) {
			modelArray = new int[7];
    			modelArray[0] = modelsIds[0];
    			modelArray[1] = modelsIds[1];
    			modelArray[2] = modelsIds[2];
    			modelArray[3] = modelsIds[3];
    			modelArray[4] = modelsIds[4];
			modelArray[5] = modelsIds[5];
			modelArray[6] = modelsIds[6];
		}
		if(modelAmount == 8) {
			modelArray = new int[8];
    			modelArray[0] = modelsIds[0];
    			modelArray[1] = modelsIds[1];
    			modelArray[2] = modelsIds[2];
    			modelArray[3] = modelsIds[3];
    			modelArray[4] = modelsIds[4];
			modelArray[5] = modelsIds[5];
			modelArray[6] = modelsIds[6];
			modelArray[7] = modelsIds[7];
		}
		if(modelAmount == 9) {
			modelArray = new int[9];
    			modelArray[0] = modelsIds[0];
    			modelArray[1] = modelsIds[1];
    			modelArray[2] = modelsIds[2];
    			modelArray[3] = modelsIds[3];
    			modelArray[4] = modelsIds[4];
			modelArray[5] = modelsIds[5];
			modelArray[6] = modelsIds[6];
			modelArray[7] = modelsIds[7];
			modelArray[8] = modelsIds[8];
		}
		if(modelAmount == 10) {
			modelArray = new int[10];
    			modelArray[0] = modelsIds[0];
    			modelArray[1] = modelsIds[1];
    			modelArray[2] = modelsIds[2];
    			modelArray[3] = modelsIds[3];
    			modelArray[4] = modelsIds[4];
			modelArray[5] = modelsIds[5];
			modelArray[6] = modelsIds[6];
			modelArray[7] = modelsIds[7];
			modelArray[8] = modelsIds[8];
			modelArray[9] = modelsIds[9];
		}
		if(modelAmount == 11) {
			modelArray = new int[11];
    			modelArray[0] = modelsIds[0];
    			modelArray[1] = modelsIds[1];
    			modelArray[2] = modelsIds[2];
    			modelArray[3] = modelsIds[3];

			modelArray[7] = modelsIds[7];
			modelArray[8] = modelsIds[8];
			modelArray[9] = modelsIds[9];
			modelArray[10] = modelsIds[10];
		}
    		standingAnim = stand;
    		walkingAnim = walk;
    		anInt58 = walk;
    		anInt83 = walk;
    		anInt55 = walk;	
    		combatLevel = level;
		description = examine.getBytes();
		aByte68 = space;
    		name = name;
	}

don’t beg me for the models, cuz i ain’t uploading them for ya. they’ve been released docens of times.
